snippet: The move extends Mr. Iovine’s wide reach in entertainment and technology.
abstract: Record executive Jimmy Iovine joins board of Live Nation Entertainment, extending his already wide reach in worlds of entertainment and technology; Iovine joined Apple earlier in year as part of its $3 billion purchase of Beats.
lead_paragraph: The move extends Mr. Iovine’s wide reach in entertainment and technology.

headline.main: Jimmy Iovine, of Beats and Apple, Is Named to Live Nation’s Board
headline.print_headline: Live Nation Board Adds Apple Official
